pages.text: The $(thing)Charcoal Pit$() is the main method of obtaining $(item)Charcoal$(), which is the main source of $(l:basic_smithing/forge)fuel$() in TFC. To build a charcoal pit, we must first create a $(item)log pile$().
A log pile is placed by $(4)Shift + Right Clicking$() with a log. Continue right clicking to store up to 16 logs.
pages.name: Log Pile

pages.text: Put most simply, the charcoal pit is a structure of log piles covered by non-flammable solid blocks. You will want to dig a small hole in the ground, and fill it with log piles (each with 16 logs, to maximize output). Then, cover the piles with a solid block (dirt works best). Then, remove one covering block to expose a log pile, and drop a $(item)torch$() on it. Wait a few seconds until it lights, then cover the exposed log pile and wait. After, you can dig the charcoal that's left with a shovel.
